protected void exportMesh(TriangleMesh terrain,
                          java.io.PrintWriter where,
                          AllFracplanetParameters aparams,
                          Progress progress,
                          boolean doubleIlluminate,
                          boolean noShadow,
                          boolean first)
Export the entire mesh data to the output

Parameters:
first - 
true
if this is the first mesh written
terrain - The mesh to be exported
where - The PrintWriter to write the data to
aparams - The parameters for use during the export
progress - An object to report export progress to
doubleIlluminate - Whether to request double illumination
noShadow - Whether to disable shadowing

export

public void export(java.io.OutputStream target,
                   AllFracplanetParameters params,
                   Progress progress)
            throws java.io.IOException
Carry out an export operation. The exporter should attempt to handle all parameters it can support from the input set and write the result to the specified stream.

Specified by:
export in interface Exporter
Parameters:
target - The stream where data is to be written
params - The parameters describing the terrain and rendering
progress - The object to use for reporting progress
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If there is an error exporting the data
